message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.ST, cs.SY 

The paper discusses a method for approximate Bayesian posterior inference, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The use of control variates and stochastic optimization suggests a focus on optimization techniques, which is often studied in the subfield of machine learning (cs.LG). The examples given in the paper are logistic regression and an approximation to the HDP, which are both commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Additionally, the use of stochastic optimization and control variates is also relevant to the subfields of statistics (cs.ST) and control systems (cs.SY).
